name: ESC (SimanGuyman)
description:
A simple game with a simple goal. Move a ball as long as possible without touching the edges. Easy, right?

Prove to your friends you are the greatest player, acquire over two different cursor skins, and give us everything you've got. Everything. We believe in you. :)

A 2021 utGDDC Game Jam submission (my first one! :D) with the theme Going Outside.
